name: Ensure rivets are pulled up tight
All soffit panels pulled tight to each other with siliconed joints
Mark thread with 'torque mark' as visual indicator
All fixings present and well secured
All fixings present and well secured
All connection points (clamps, sprinkler, vents, etc.) accessible via access panels
All fasciae are protected by stretchwrap
All handrail/capping protected by low-tack tape
Pavers restrained from transport movement by strapping plywood over top
Site pack includes fixings, cut slabs, side fasciae, post cladding and any other site required parts
Verify barcode label has been stuck in place
Well adhered with no wrinkles or bubbles
Verify all parts have been fitted as drawings and schedules
Mark thread with 'torque mark' as visual indicator
